summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2802 for the improvement of Thirty-eighth Avenue South, from Court Seattle to Alaska Street, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; all in the City of Seattle, by constructing watermains therein, together with all appurtenances necessary for the proper water services and fire protection of said district, under Ordinance No. 33499, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
